page.title: 10Education
page.content: Most children start their education at one of the many small private pre-school playgroups in the town. Children transfer to the large comprehensive school at the age of eleven and can leave at sixteen though many stay on until the age of eighteen. Many adults continue their education by following part time courses and the new Mount Pleasant Community Centre is used for day classes whilst schools are used for evening classes. Courses in yoga, physical fitness and dance seem popular at present. Parents take a very keen interest in their children's education and parent/teacher association activities are very well supported.
